dashboard.discoverToday: Discover what the cosmos has in store for you today.
dashboard.noReadings: You haven't done any readings yet.

tarotChoice.errorBody: Could not load the tarot spreads. Please try again later.
tarotChoice.title: Choose a Tarot Spread
tarotChoice.subtitle: Each spread offers a unique perspective on your questions.

coffee.title: Coffee Ground Reading
coffee.uploadDesc: Click here to select a file
tips: Hold your camera steady for a sharp photo.
Photograph the inside of the cup from directly above.
Make sure the symbols are clearly visible.
coffee.clickToUse: Click on the symbols you want to use for your reading.

dream.title: Dream Interpretation
dream.describe: Describe your dream in as much detail as possible. What happened? Who was there? How did you feel? The more details, the better the interpretation.

numerology.title: Numerology
numerology.discover: Discover the meaning of the numbers in your life. Enter your full birth name and date of birth to reveal your life path, soul, and personality numbers.

readingDetail.title: {{method}} Reading
readingDetail.noInterpretation: There is no interpretation for this reading yet.

freeReading.title: Try a Free Reading
freeReading.subtitle: Get instant insight with our popular Past, Present & Future spread. No registration required.

features.title: Discover the Worlds Within
features.subtitle: After registering, you'll gain access to a suite of mystical tools to illuminate your path. Discover what the stars have in store for you.

tarot.title: Tarot Spreads
tarot.description: Gain deep insight into any situation with a variety of card spreads, from a quick daily card to the comprehensive Celtic Cross.

coffee.title: Coffee Reading
coffee.description: Discover the hidden messages in your coffee cup. Choose the symbols you see or upload a photo for a traditional Turkish coffee reading.

dream.title: Dream Interpretation
dream.description: Your dreams contain valuable insights. Describe your nightly adventures and let our AI unravel the symbolism and meaning for you.

numerology.title: Numerology
numerology.description: The numbers in your life are no coincidence. Discover your life path, soul's desire, and personality based on your name and date of birth.
